title: konjum shilambolikka
sahitya:
rAgA:  cenjuruTi   
  konjam shilambolikka ingE (nI) vA kaNNA kOmaLa mukham kATTiki-kali tIrkka vA


anupallavi

  tanjam tanjam enrAl anjalenraruLum anjana vaNNA un kanja malarppadam tazhuvum
			rAg  punnAgavarALi


caraNam 1    venjina nAgam mEl vENDi nI naTam payinrAl nenjam tuDituDittu nayanam nIr pozhiyudaDA
 kanrin pin kuzhalUdik-kAniDaiyE nI shenrAl ennagham kaLippuDanE unnait-toDarudaDA
    caraNam 2  			rAgA:  yamunAkalyANiAa:S R2 G3 P M2 P D2 S  Av:  S D2 P M2 P G3 R2 S  pirar manai veNNaikkAgap-pirambaDi nI paTTAl tirumEni varuDa en karamiraNDum tavikkudaDA
 uralizhittu maram shAittu iruvarkkaruL kUrnda uttamanunait-tazhuvi mecca manam vizhaiyudaDA
    caraNam 3  			rAgA:  brndAvanasArangAAa:S R2 M1 P N3 S  Av:  S N2 P M1 R2 G2 R2 S  paraman unran kuzhalishaiyil pArellAm mei marakka paravashamAi gOpiyargaL karam kOttu jati pODa Iruyirum OruyirAi onrum uyarnilai ninaindu unakkAga Enguminda Ezhaikkural shevimaDuttuk-
